description: Creates a new version for an existing IoT software package. Requires permission to access the CreatePackageVersion and GetIndexingConfiguration actions.

parameters.name: packageName
parameters.description: The name of the associated software package.

parameters.name: versionName
parameters.description: The name of the new package version.

parameters.name: attributes
parameters.description: Metadata that can be used to define a package version's configuration. For example, the S3 file location, configuration options that are being sent to the device or fleet. The combined size of all the attributes on a package version is limited to 3KB. (string) --- (string) ---

parameters.name: artifact
parameters.description: The various build components created during the build process such as libraries and configuration files that make up a software package version. s3Location (dict) --- The S3 location. bucket (string) --- The S3 bucket. key (string) --- The S3 key. version (string) --- The S3 bucket version.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Metadata that can be used to manage the package version. (string) --- (string) ---

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: A unique case-sensitive identifier that you can provide to ensure the idempotency of the request. Don't reuse this client token if a new idempotent request is required. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

nested_items.name: packageVersionArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the package.

nested_items.name: packageName
nested_items.description: The name of the associated software package.

nested_items.name: versionName
nested_items.description: The name of the new package version.

nested_items.name: attributes
nested_items.description: Metadata that were added to the package version that can be used to define a package version's configuration.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the package version. For more information, see Package version lifecycle.

nested_items.name: errorReason
nested_items.description: Error reason for a package version failure during creation or update.
